payload.name: case-based
payload.core: Retrieve similar past cases from a library and adapt their solutions to current problem; learning from specific experiences via retrieval metrics and adaptation operators.
proc: identify key features of current problem
search case library for similar past cases
rank retrieved cases by similarity metrics
adapt prior solution to current context
validate adapted solution fits new constraints
check: precedent still valid in current environment?

diff.vs_analogical: more operational; emphasizes retrieval metrics, adaptation operators, and structured case libraries rather than structural mapping

fail.desc: applying precedent without checking context changes; past solutions may not apply when circumstances differ in important ways

ex.approach: retrieve similar past incidents from runbook; adapt previous fix considering current infrastructure differences
